ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: But they hamstrung her and woke up full of remorse,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: But they hamstrung her; and on the morrow were repentant,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: But they hamstrung her and then regretted it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They slew the she-camel, but later became regretful
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So they hamstrung her, and in the morning could only regret.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: But they killed her, and then they became regretful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: But they hamstrung her, then regretted;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: But they hamstrung her, and in the morning they were remorseful,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: But they hamstrung her, and then were penitent.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Yet they hamstrung her, and then they became regretful:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Then they hamstrung her; and then they became regretful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: But they hamstrung her, whereupon they became regretful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: But they ham-strung her: then did they become full of regrets.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: But they killed her, and then they became regretful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Yet they hamstrung her, and in the morning they were remorseful,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: But they slaughtered her, and became full of remorse.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: But they hamstrung her and so became regretful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:157] But they hamstrung her — a group of them hamstrung her with the approval of others; and then became remorseful, for having hamstrung it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: But they hamstrung her) they killed her, (and then were penitent) and they regretted killing her.
